tool_description: Connects to various shipping carrier APIs to retrieve real-time tracking information, delivery status, and shipment details.

carrier_code.description: Carrier code (UPS, FEDEX, USPS, DHL, etc.)

api_key.description: API authentication key for the carrier

include_history.description: Whether to include full tracking history

error_messages: Invalid carrier code: Supported carriers are UPS, FEDEX, USPS, DHL, and others. Check carrier documentation.
API authentication failed: Verify the API key is valid and has proper permissions.
Tracking number format invalid: Ensure tracking number matches the carrier's format requirements.
Carrier API unavailable: The carrier's API service is temporarily unavailable. Try again later.
Rate limit exceeded: Too many API requests. Wait before making additional requests.
usage: Provide tracking_number, carrier_code, and api_key to retrieve tracking data. Set include_history to false for current status only.

raw_tracking_data.description: Raw JSON response from carrier API
